name: Blackwood Crossing
description: Blackwood Crossing is a story-driven first-person adventure game. An intriguing and emotive tale exploring the fragile relationship between orphaned siblings, Scarlett and Finn. When their paths cross with a mysterious figure, an ordinary train ride evolves into a magical story of life, love and loss.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core i3-550 2.5ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 460 or higher with 1GB of Memory DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
